name: Hunter's Legacy
description: Hunter’s Legacy is an old-school 2D single-player Metroidvania platformer where you control Ikki, a fierce kitty skilled with twin swords and a bow, better known as the Great Huntress of Un'Amak.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Hunters Legacy is a very well done, action packed, 2D platformer, giving you the power to play as……. a cute kitty! Not just a cute kitty but a BADASS cute kitty!! Fight your way through numerous worlds and diverse enemies, giving you a run for your litter. First thing that really got me when playing with the wonderful art and music, as the game progresses you can new abilities and explore new areas/worlds, expanding on the initial impression and blowing your tiny kitty mind!
